statements: UPDATE CustomerBehaviorAnalysis SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerBehaviorAnalysis SET purchase_history = '{"total_purchases": 5}' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE CustomerBehaviorAnalysis SET last_interaction = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE CustomerBehaviorAnalysis SET purchase_history = '{"purchases": ["item1", "item2", "item3"]}' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE CustomerBehaviorAnalysis SET customer_name = 'John Doe', last_interaction = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE CustomerBehaviorAnalysis SET purchase_history = purchase_history || '{"purchases": ["item4", "item5"]}' WHERE customer_id = 789;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET last_purchase_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE personalized_products SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET total_spent = total_spent + 50.00 WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET total_spent = total_spent + 100 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE personalized_products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE customer_behavior SET last_purchase_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET quantity = 5 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 100;
UPDATE transactions SET quantity = 3, transaction_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 500;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 99.99 WHERE product_id = 100;
UPDATE recommendations SET recommendation_date = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE recommendation_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE customer_id = 2 AND product_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET price = 29.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE Purchases SET purchase_date = '2022-01-15 10:00:00' WHERE purchase_id = 201;
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1 WHERE order_date < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH;
UPDATE Purchases p, Products pr SET pr.price = pr.price * 0.9 WHERE p.product_id = pr.product_id AND p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
